title: CBIC Announces Scheduled Maintenance for HSNS Cess Application Integration
content:
# CBIC Announces Scheduled Maintenance for HSNS Cess Application Integration

Ek important update hai. Government ne HSNS Cess Application ke ACES-GST portal ke saath integration ke liye scheduled maintenance announce kiya hai.

*   **What is happening?** The HSNS Cess Application will be integrated with the ACES-GST portal.
*   **Maintenance Window:** This scheduled maintenance will take place from 22:00 Hours on 30th January 2026 to 10:00 Hours on 31st January 2026.
*   **Impact on Functionality:**
    *   Central Excise & Service Tax (CE&ST) Taxpayer functionality will resume after the maintenance.
    *   HSNS Cess Taxpayer functionality will become operative from 1st February 2026 onwards.

CBIC ne is inconvenience ke liye khed vyakt kiya hai. Taxpayers ko accordingly apni planning karne ki salaah di jaati hai.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://www.cbic.gov.in)

*Published on: 31 January 2026*
